name: Hair Coloring Service
description:
ADD to CART!!


Weft Sealant 
Ombre Hair Coloring
Semi-Permanent Hair Coloring 
Permanent Hair Coloring 



The price listed is the amount per bundle. Be sure to add the correct amount needed. 


***Allow additional days to process***


*Welcome to the Tress Life*

name: Virgin Hair Clip-Ins
description:
Don't want it sewn in?
Get it Clipped in!!

Select your lengths in "Individual Virgin Hair Bundles"
Then add the option of Clip-Ins to your cart!!

$35 per bundle

*Welcome to the Tress Life*

name: Virgin Closure Pieces
description:
Virgin Closure Pieces starting at $90!!!!


Straight Closure Pieces 
Available in Inches 8"-18"

Body Wave Closure Pieces 
Available in Inches 8"-18"

Deep Wave Closure Pieces 
Available in Inches 8"-18"

Tress Curly Closure Pieces 
Available in Inches 10"-20"


***Please specify the wave type you are ordering****

**Towards the end of checkout there is an area where you can leave any specific instructions or leave any notes to us. In that area please state the Origin & Texture of the hair closure you would like as well as any other comments you have for us. Thank you

***Payment & Order Processing is 2-3 days. Once cleared your Tress Package will ship and be received within 3-7 business days***

-GoldenTress-

name: Individual Virgin Hair Bundle *Deals*
description:
Individual Virgin Hair Bundle Deals starting at $75!!

Natural Straight
Body Wave
Loose Wave
Deep Wave 
Tress Curl

You couldn't find a better deal anywhere but at Golden Tress!! You pick, we ship!!


****Shipping is 3 to 7 Business Days*** 

Cuticles are layered to face the same direction from root to end which helps prevent tangling.

3.5oz-4oz bundles

Hair comes in Natural Colors 

All hair is Machine Wefted 
Hair can be colored straighten and styled as desired

***Payment & Order Processing is 2-3 days. Once cleared your Tress Package will ship and be received within 3-7 business days***

**Towards the end of checkout there is an area where you can leave any specific instructions or leave any notes to us. In that area please state the Origin & Texture of the hair you would like as well as any other comments you have for us. Thank you


-GoldenTress-
